name: Aldori Dueling Disciple
text: Your prowess in Aldori swordplay grants you bravado.
prerequisites: Exotic Weapon Proficiency (Aldori dueling sword), Weapon Finesse, Weapon Focus (Aldori dueling sword).
benefit: You gain a +2 morale bonus on Intimidate checks to demoralize opponents, and the DC of any attempt to demoralize you increases by 2. When you’re participating in a duel, these bonuses increase to +4.
staminaText: During any combat that is not a duel, you can spend 1 stamina point at the start of your turn to treat the combat as a duel until the start of your next turn for the purpose of gaining the benefits of the Aldori Dueling Discipline feat.
prerequisites_zh: 异种武器擅长（奥多里决斗剑），武器娴熟，武器专攻（奥多里决斗剑）。
benefit_zh: 你可以在威吓鉴定中获得+2的士气加值，而任何试图降低你士气的DC都会增加2。当你参加一场决斗时，这些奖励就会增加到+4。
staminaText_zh: 在任何并非决斗的战斗中，你可以在你回合开始的时候消耗1点耐力来在决定获得奥多里战斗学徒专长好处的时候将这场战斗视为决斗，这将持续到你的下一回合开始。
